edu.uga.cs.rentaride.object

Interface ObjectLayer


  • public interface ObjectLayer
    This is the interface to the Object Layer subsystem of the Rent-A-Ride system. For each class, there are four basic operations: create, find, store, and delete. Each of the find operations, the model argument represents an object with none, all, or just some of the attributes defined. The find operations will return only the matching objects, i.e., the objects with the exact same values for all of the provided attribute values in the model object: -- if the model argument is null, all objects are returned; -- if the persistent identifier attribute is provided, only one object is returned; -- if some of the attributes are provided, some of the matching objects are returned.

    • Method Detail

      • createAdministrator

        Administrator createAdministrator(java.lang.String firstName,
                                java.lang.String lastName,
                                java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.util.Date createDate)
        Create a new Administrator object, given the set of initial attribute values. The UserStatus of the new Administrator object is UserStatus.ACTIVE.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name
        lastName - the last name
        userName - the user name (login name)
        emailAddress - the email address
        password - the password
        createDate - the creation date
        Returns:
        the new Administrator object instance with the given attribute values, UserStatus is UserStatus.ACTIVE

      • createAdministrator

        Administrator createAdministrator()
        Create a new Administrator object with undefined attribute values. The UserStatus of the new Administrator object is UserStatus.ACTIVE.
        Returns:
        the new Administrator object instance

      • findAdministrator

        java.util.Iterator<Administrator> findAdministrator(Administrator modelAdministrator)
                                                    throws RARException
        Return an iterator of Administrator objects satisfying the search criteria given in the modelAdministrator object.
        Parameters:
        modelAdministrator - a model Administrator object specifying the search criteria
        Returns:
        an Iterator of the located Administrator objects
        Throws:
        RARException - in case there is a problem with the retrieval of the requested objects

      • storeAdministrator

        void storeAdministrator(Administrator administrator)
                        throws RARException
        Store a given Administrator object in persistent data store.
        Parameters:
        administrator - the object to be persisted
        Throws:
        RARException - in case there was an error while persisting the object

      • createCustomer

        Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String firstName,
                      java.lang.String lastName,
                      java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String emailAddress,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      java.util.Date createDate,
                      java.util.Date membershipExpiration,
                      java.lang.String licenseState,
                      java.lang.String licenseNumber,
                      java.lang.String residenceAddress,
                      java.lang.String cardNumber,
                      java.util.Date cardExpiration)
        Create a new Customer object, given the set of initial attribute values. The UserStatus of the new Customer object is UserStatus.ACTIVE.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name
        lastName - the last name
        userName - the user (login) name
        emailAddress - the exmail address
        password - the password
        createDate - the date when the customer has been created
        membershipExpiration - the date when the membership expires
        licenseState - the issuing state of the driver's license
        licenseNumber - the license number
        residenceAddress - the residence address
        cardNumber - the credit card number
        cardExpiration - the expiration date of the credit card
        Returns:
        the new Customer object instance with the given attribute values, UserStatus is UserStatus.ACTIVE

        Create a new Customer object with undefined attribute values. The UserStatus of the new Administrator object is UserStatus.ACTIVE.
        Returns:

      • createReservation

        Reservation createReservation(VehicleType vehicleType,
                            RentalLocation rentalLocation,
                            Customer customer,
                            java.util.Date pickupTime,
                            int rentalDuration)
                              throws RARException
        Create a new Reservation object, given the set of initial attribute values.
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the type of the vehicle reserved
        rentalLocation - the location for this reservation
        customer - the customer making the reservation
        pickupTime - the requested pickup time
        rentalDuration - the duration of the requested rental (in hours)
        Returns:
        the new Reservation object instance with the given attribute values
        Throws:
        RARException - in case either the vehicleType, rentalLocation, or customer is null

      • createVehicle

        Vehicle createVehicle(VehicleType vehicleType,
                    java.lang.String make,
                    java.lang.String model,
                    int year,
                    java.lang.String registrationTag,
                    int mileage,
                    java.util.Date lastServiced,
                    RentalLocation rentalLocation,
                    VehicleCondition vehicleCondition,
                    VehicleStatus vehicleStatus)
                      throws RARException
        Create a new Vehicle object, given the set of initial attribute value.
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the type of the created vehicle (cannot be null)
        make - the make of the vehicle
        model - the model
        year - the year of the vehicle
        registrationTag - the registration tag
        mileage - the current mileage of the vehicle
        lastServiced - the date when the vehicle was last serviced
        rentalLocation - the rental location of this vehicle (cannot be null)
        vehicleCondition - the condition of this vehicle
        vehicleStatus - the status of this vehicle
        Returns:
        the new Vehicle object instance with the given attribute values
        Throws:
        RARException - in case either the vehicleType and/or the rentalLocation is null

      • createVehicle

        Vehicle createVehicle()
        Create a new Vehicle object with undefined attribute values.
        Returns:

                            int maxHrs,

                            VehicleType vehicleType)
                              throws RARException
        Create a new HourlyPrice object, given the set of initial attribute values.
        Parameters:
        minHrs - the minimum number of hours for this price
        maxHrs - the maximum number of hours for this price
        price - the price for this hourly range
        vehicleType - the vehicle type this hourly price is for
        Returns:
        the new HourlyPrice object instance with the given attribute values
        Throws:
        RARException - in case the vehicleType is null

        hourlyPrice - the object to be deleted.
        Throws:
        RARException - in case there is a problem with the deletion of the object

      • findRentARideCfg

        RentARideConfig findRentARideCfg()
        Return the RentARideConfig object. The RentARideConfig class is a singleton class, so only one object will exist.
        Returns:
        the RentARideConfig object

      • storeRentARideCfg

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        RARException - in case there was an error while persisting the object
